episodes.title: Answers
episodes.author: Two-Up Productions
episodes.summary:
APR reporter Lia Haddock receives a disturbing audio file that appears to have been recorded in Limetown during the Panic. Her full interview with the sender of this audio file will be broadcast on Monday December 14. 

www.limetown.com

episodes.title: Episode 1: What We Know
episodes.author: Two-Up Productions
episodes.summary:
Ten years ago, over three hundred men, women and children disappeared from a small town in Tennessee, never to be heard from again.  In this podcast, American Public Radio reporter Lia Haddock asks the question once more, "What happened to the people of Limetown?"

www.limetown.com
